title.text: Helyette: Inflectional Thesaurus for Agglutinative Languages

introductionContent.text: In the environment of word-processors thesauri serve the user's convenience in choosing the best suitable synonym of a word.
Words in text of agglutinative languages occur almost always as inflected forms, thus finding them directly in a stem vocabulary is impossible.
H01y0ltu, the inflectional thesaurus coping with this problem is introduced in the paper.
